item.title: Why Is CRVS Stock Rising Today?
item.description: Corvus stated that cohort 4 of its placebo-controlled trial showed favorable safety and efficacy results consistent with results from the previous thr...

item.title: Why NVAX Stock Is Popping Pre-Market – And What Does Pfizer Have To Do With It?
item.description: The company signed a licensing agreement with Pfizer, granting it non-exclusive rights to use Matrix-M adjuvant in up to two disease areas.

item.title: INVO Fertility’s 350% Spike Puts Microcap IVF Stocks Back On Retail Radar
item.description: Retail watchers for IVF stock increased a whopping 726% over the last 24 hours and 3,700% over seven days, according to Stocktwits data.

item.title: Trump’s Fed Chair Pick Could Come Next Week, Bessent Reportedly Says – And Prediction Markets Have A Front-Runner
item.description: The Treasury Secretary stated that President Trump has personally met with all potential Fed Chair candidates.

item.title: Tokenized Trading Is Coming To NYSE And Chainlink’s Role May Take Time To Surface, Analyst Says
item.description: NYSE plans a blockchain platform for tokenized stocks and ETFs, enabling 24/7 trading and near-instant settlement pending approval.
